Email is invalid
First name is invalid
Last name is invalid
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from '../Auth/auth.service'; //import { RequestBody } from 'ng-openapi-gen/lib/request-body'; import { PassengerService } from './../api/services/passenger.service'; import { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register-passenger', templateUrl: './register-passenger.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register-passenger.component.css'] }) export class RegisterPassengerComponent { constructor(private passengerService: PassengerService, private fb: FormBuilder , private authService: AuthService, private router: Router, ) { } form = this.fb.group({ email: [''], firstName: [''], lastName: [''], gender: [true] }); CheckPassanger(): void { const email = this.form.get("email")?.value ?? ''; // Use an empty string as a default value if email is null or undefined const parms = { email: email }; this.passengerService.findPassangerPassenger(parms) .subscribe(this.login) } Register() { console.log(this.form.value); this.passengerService .registerPassenger({ body: this.form.value }) .subscribe(this.login, e => { if (e.status != 404) console.error(e) } ) } private login = () => { this.authService.loginUser({ email: this.form.get("email")?.value }) this.router.navigate(['/search-flights']) } }
